alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 10:00PM CDT until September 19 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA COUNTY... At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Oklahoma City, or near The Fairgrounds, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Midwest City, Del City, Bethany, Warr Acres, Spencer, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, and Smith Village. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
